languages.text: "Сейчас займусь. Прошу почтенную публику не расходиться — у нас осталось важное дело!"

traits.locale_text: "Сейчас займусь. Прошу почтенную публику не расходиться — у нас осталось важное дело!"

languages.text: "Will do. I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer — we still have an important bit of business to take care of!"
languages.original_text: "Сейчас займусь. Прошу почтенную публику не расходиться — у нас осталось важное дело!"

traits.locale_text: "Will do. I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer — we still have an important bit of business to take care of!"
"Will do. I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer — we still have an important bit of business to take care of!"
"Will do. I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer — we still have an important bit of business to take care of!"
"Will do. I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer — we still have an important bit of business to take care of!"
"Will do. I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer — we still have an important bit of business to take care of!"

languages.text: “我会的。我希望能请我们尊贵的客人们再等一会儿，我们还有另一件重要的事情要处理！”
languages.original_text: "Will do. I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer — we still have an important bit of business to take care of!"

traits.locale_text: “我会的。我希望能请我们尊贵的客人们再等一会儿，我们还有另一件重要的事情要处理！”

languages.text: «Eso haré. Quisiera pedir a los asistentes que se queden un poco más. ¡Todavía queda un asunto importante que tratar!».
languages.original_text: "Will do. I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer — we still have an important bit of business to take care of!"

traits.locale_text: «Eso haré. Quisiera pedir a los asistentes que se queden un poco más. ¡Todavía queda un asunto importante que tratar!».

languages.text: 「承知いたしました。参列者の皆さんにはしばしお待ちいただくようにお伝えします。まだ大事な仕事が残されていますからね！」
languages.original_text: "Will do. I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer — we still have an important bit of business to take care of!"

traits.locale_text: 「承知いたしました。参列者の皆さんにはしばしお待ちいただくようにお伝えします。まだ大事な仕事が残されていますからね！」

languages.text: "Wird erledigt. Ich darf die geschätzten Gäste bitten, noch ein wenig zu bleiben – wir müssen noch eine wichtige Angelegenheit erledigen!"
languages.original_text: "Will do. I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer — we still have an important bit of business to take care of!"

traits.locale_text: "Wird erledigt. Ich darf die geschätzten Gäste bitten, noch ein wenig zu bleiben – wir müssen noch eine wichtige Angelegenheit erledigen!"

languages.text: « Ce sera fait, mais je demande à nos très estimés invités de bien vouloir rester encore quelques instants. Nous avons toujours une affaire importante à régler ! »
languages.original_text: "Will do. I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer — we still have an important bit of business to take care of!"

traits.locale_text: « Ce sera fait, mais je demande à nos très estimés invités de bien vouloir rester encore quelques instants. Nous avons toujours une affaire importante à régler ! »

languages.text: "Tabii. Saygıdeğer konuklardan biraz daha durmalarını rica edeceğim. Halletmemiz gereken önemli bir iş daha var."
languages.original_text: "Will do. I would ask the esteemed guests to stay for a moment longer — we still have an important bit of business to take care of!"

traits.locale_text: "Tabii. Saygıdeğer konuklardan biraz daha durmalarını rica edeceğim. Halletmemiz gereken önemli bir iş daha var."
